title: Traditional Normalized ETL
deduction_notes: Passed logical consistency. Compatible with all L2 facts. Asset types use text column (not lookup). Unknown enum codes need fallback handling.
validation_notes: Q3 testing complete. 17 brokers, 10000+ deals synced at 100% success rate. All failure patterns resolved.

method: Create 15 lookup tables for all Velocity enums (street_types, provinces, etc.)
Create 12 normalized main tables with foreign keys (vl_deals, vl_borrowers, vl_liabilities, etc.)
Build TypeScript transformer to flatten nested JSON into table rows
Run batch migration: iterate 40 brokers, fetch all deals, upsert to tables
Schedule cron job (every 15 min) to poll for updated deals
content.expected_outcome: Fully normalized relational schema optimized for complex queries and joins

rationale.anomaly: Velocity API returns deeply nested JSON that needs to be queryable for proposal generation
rationale.approach: Classic ETL normalization - proven, well-understood pattern
pros: Strong data integrity via FK constraints
